orbe.title: Welcome to Orbetalk!
orbe.sub-title: Connect to the platform that simplifies and enhances your conversations

login.title: Login to continue
login.sub-title: To login, enter your credentials below
login.forgot.password.message: Enter your email to recover your password.
login.forgot.password.recover.email.valid: The recovery email has been sent to the provided address. Please check your spam folder as well.
login.forgot.password.recover.email.sucess: Check your inbox. We sent an email to help you recover access to your account.
login.recover.password.message: Please fill in the fields below to create your new password.
login.recover.password.change.email.valid: The password was successfully changed. Please wait while you are redirected.
login.recover.password.change.email.sucess: The password was successfully changed. Please wait while you are redirected.

onboarding.title: Almost there! Just one more step
onboarding.subtitle: Complete your registration to enjoy all the benefits
onboarding.success: Registration completed successfully! You will be redirected to login in a moment...

tag.delete: Do you want to delete the tag:

webhook.title: Configure webhook
webhook.verifyToken.hint: Click 'Generate Verification Token' or manually enter the token. This code is essential for WhatsApp to validate the authenticity of the webhook.
webhook.link.hint: The link will be generated when creating the webhook.

contact.delete: Do you want to delete the contact:

channel.title: Channel
channel.delete: Do you want to delete the channel:
channel.webhook: You are setting up the channel manually. To receive messages from Meta, you need to configure the webhook on

left-panel.description: We will help you automate replies, marketing campaigns and much more

right-panel.title: How would you like to connect to your WhatsApp channel?
right-panel.step-1-facebook: Connect a new channel through Facebook embedded signup
right-panel.step-2-sub-title: If you already have a WhatsApp Business Account, a phone number and a verified Business Manager and would like to set it up manually.
right-panel.description-step-2-sub-title: The information for manual registration is available on Meta for Developers and/or Business Manager.
right-panel.description-step-2-facebook-main-title: How to connect with the Official WhatsApp API?
right-panel.description-step-2-facebook-sub-title: Before connecting your number, make sure everything is ready!
right-panel.description-step-2-facebook-sub-title-1: About the phone number you want to connect?
right-panel.description-step-2-facebook-sub-title-2: Would you like to use a new number?
right-panel.description-step-2-facebook-sub-title-3: This is the easiest way to get started.
right-panel.description-step-2-facebook-sub-title-4: Migrate a number in use on regular or Business WhatsApp
right-panel.description-step-2-facebook-sub-title-5: Migrate a number already connected to WhatsApp with another provider
right-panel.description-step-2-facebook-sub-title-7: WhatsApp does not allow the same number to be used on the app and API simultaneously.
right-panel.description-step-2-facebook-sub-title-8: If you want to migrate this number, you must completely close your current WhatsApp account, and all your chats will be lost.
right-panel.description-step-2-facebook-sub-title-9: I have already disabled 2FA and want to continue with this number
right-panel.description-step-2-facebook-sub-title-10: When migrating a number registered with another provider, we will receive all templates, number quality and the Official WhatsApp Account badge (if applicable).
right-panel.description-step-2-facebook-sub-title-11: All current conversations will remain with your previous provider.
right-panel.description-step-2-facebook-sub-title-12: Before continuing, make sure to disable 2FA authentication in Meta Business Manager
right-panel.description-step-2-facebook-sub-title-13: About administrator access to Meta Business Manager?
right-panel.description-step-2-facebook-sub-title-14: I have full access to my company's Meta Business Manager.
right-panel.description-step-2-facebook-sub-title-16: Meta will charge all WhatsApp API usage fees to this card.
right-panel.description-step-2-facebook-sub-title-17: You can add it later, but you won't be able to start outbound conversations until you do.

flow.delete: Do you want to delete the flow:

flowExecution.interrupt: The execution flow was interrupted successfully

template.request-sync: Updating message template statuses with WhatsApp templates has been successfully requested.
template.name: Message template name
template.delete: Do you want to delete the message template:
template.language.hint: Choose languages for your message template.
template.category.utility.hint: Send messages about an existing account or order.
template.category.authentication.hint: Send code to verify a transaction or login.
template.header.hint: Add a title in the selected language or choose a media type for the header.
template.header.example.sub-description: To help Meta analyze your content, provide examples of variables or media in the header. Do not include customer information. Meta’s Cloud API analyzes template parameters and variables to protect the security and integrity of its services. Variables will be mapped and populated with real values when sending messages.
template.body.hint: Add body text in the selected language.
template.body.text.label: Body text
template.body.example.sub-description: To help Meta analyze your message template, include an example of each variable in the body text. Do not use real customer information. Meta’s Cloud API analyzes variable parameters to protect the security and integrity of its services. Variables will be mapped and populated with real values when sending messages.
template.footer.hint: Add footer text in the selected language.

button.label: Buttons
button.hint: Create buttons that let customers reply to your message or perform an action.

campaign.name: Campaign name
campaign.delete: Do you want to delete the campaign:
campaign.data.sub-title: Necessary information to start your campaign.
campaign.data.info: Fill in the information below to start your campaign. You can launch it immediately or schedule it for your preferred date and time.
campaign.target-audience.sub-title: How do you want to load your audience?
campaign.target-audience.info: Select the recipients of your campaign. You can import a file with your leads or use the contacts already registered in the system.
campaign.columns-mapping: Please identify the columns in the file that correspond to the fields listed below:
campaign.config.template.sub-title: Now it's time to customize the message template according to your campaign.
campaign.config.template.info: Select a pre-configured template in Message Templates and adjust the predefined parameters.
campaign.config.template.hint: Choose a message template. Only approved templates will be displayed.
campaign.parameter.sub-title: Please associate the values with the parameters defined in the message template.
campaign.parameter.info: You can fill the following parameters with the contact's name, phone number, or email address.
campaign.parameter.empty: No parameters have been defined for this message template...
campaign.parameter.hint: The value of the parameter {{{{parameter}}}} will be replaced with the filled value.
campaign.parameter.name: Contact name
campaign.parameter.media.hint: If you prefer, you can modify the media before sending it.

user.session.expired: Session expired, please log in again!

contact-filter.instruction-1: 1. Choose the desired operation: with all the conditions below or with any of the conditions below.
contact-filter.instruction-2: 2. The conditions are filters used to query the contacts in your database.
contact-filter.operation-any: with any of the conditions below

upload-file.instruction-1: 1. The 1st row of the spreadsheet must contain the column names.
upload-file.instruction-2: 2. You can store 3 types of information: Name, email, and phone.
upload-file.instruction-3: 3. To ensure the campaign delivery, it is essential that the spreadsheet contains a column representing the contacts' phone numbers. If this column is missing, the campaign cannot be executed.

name: Name
confirm-password.notEqual: Password confirmation does not match the password
question: Question
confirm-new-password.required: Confirming the new password is required
confirm-new-password.notEqual: New password confirmation does not match new password

rejectedReason-instructions.instruction-2: This template contains content that does not comply with WhatsApp policies
rejectedReason-instructions.instruction-3: You can edit the template and resubmit it for review

INCORRECT_CATEGORY: The template has the wrong category
INVALID_FORMAT: The template has an invalid format
TAG_CONTENT_MISMATCH: The template has content tag mismatch
SCAM: The template was rejected due to fraud

startNode.triggered: The provided keyword was found. The flow will be started.
startNode.notTriggered: The provided keyword was not found. The flow will be ended.

validation.type-not-implemented: The media type {{type}} is not supported
validation.max-size: The media type {{type}} allows files up to {{maxSize}} MB
validation.mime-type: The media type {{type}} only accepts the MIME format {{mimeTypes}}

conditionNode.noMatch: Defined conditions not met. Continuing via the alternative path.
